page.title: 13Ringmer Comprehensive School
page.content: {Ringmer School}is a{comprehensive} school with nearly{800 pupils}and over{40 teachers}on the staff. There are{30 ancillary staff}working in offices, providing meals, helping teachers and looking after the grounds. The school is for children from 11 years to 16 who live in Ringmer and the surrounding villages.The pupils are prepared from a wide range of subjects for{CSE}and{ {GCE examinations}usually taken in the fifth year. There are good{sports {facilities}including a gymnasium, the community indoor heated swimming pool and extensive playing fields. The pupils have{trips}and{exchanges}with schools in{France}and{Germany.}There are four{bands}including brass, stage and wind bands. Various{clubs}include drama, computer, rifle shooting and chess. The{uniform}is grey and green.
